effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
